aka: Dilim dönmüyor – My Tongue Does Not Turn

director.name: 塞尔皮尔·图尔汗 Serpil Turhan

this_title: Dilim dönmüyor – Meine Zunge dreht sich nicht
trans_title: Dilim dönmüyor – My Tongue Does Not Turn
introduction: Serpil Turhan’s grandparents gave up Kurdish for Turkish and the village for the city, just as her mother gave up Turkish for German and Istanbul for Berlin in turn. The director gently compiles fragments from the life of a family marked by migration.
chinese_title: Dilim dönmüyor – Meine Zunge dreht sich nicht
